author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA MOVING VERY SLOWLY IN THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA MOVING VERY SLOWLY IN THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -74.5 with movement W at 1 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA MOVING VERY SLOWLY IN THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -74.5 with movement W at 1 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
